All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AircraftCarrier
Represents an Aircraft Carrier
Battleship
Represents a Battleship
Board
Represents a game board for a single player.
BoardView
Displays a player's Board and OpponentBoard
Coordinate
Represents a coordinate on a Board
Cruiser
Represents a Cruiser
Destroyer
Represents a Destroyer
Driver
Main class
Fleet
Represents a full fleet of Ships
FleetOverview
Displays the status of each Player's Fleet
Game
Represents a full game
GameController
Controller class for a full game of Battleship.
Input
Handles input from the user
InputValidator
Validates the input from the user
Move
Represents a single move
MoveHistory
Represents the full game log
MoveHistoryView
Displays the most 22 most recent Moves
MoveHistoryWriter
Writes the full MoveHistory to a file.
MoveValidator
Validates that the coordinate entered by the user is valid
OpponentBoard
Represents a game Board for a single player.
Output
Handles all output to the user
PlacementTurn
Represents a single turn for placing every Ship in a Player's Fleet
PlacementValidator
Validates the coordinates given by the user are valid
Player
Represents a single player
PlayerView
Displays a combination of all views for a Player
Result
Represents all possible results from a Move
Ship
Represents a single ship
Square
Represents a single square on a Board
Submarine
Represents a Submarine
Turn
Represents a single turn
TurnController
Abstract class that handles overall turn operations
View
Handles the output of the current Game
